relatedRecords.name: Global AI Community - On virtual tour
relatedRecords.description: On the 8th of April 2020 the Global AI Community is hosting a 30 hour live event across timezones in different languages. Mark the date in your calendar, subscribe to our YouTube channel and tune in.

relatedRecords.description: The Global AI On Tour in Brussels Belgium on 23 June 2020 is a free event organized across the world by local communities that are passionate about artificial intelligence on Microsoft Azure.
